kvhc.util

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • kvhc.util.Player

  • public class Player
extends java.util.Observable
    Class representing a player. It knows the current step and if it is playing. Notifies observers when it changes step.
    Author:
    kvhc

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Player(Context context)
      The constructor for creating a player

    • Constructor Detail

      • Player

        public Player(Context context)
        The constructor for creating a player
        Parameters:
        context - from witch to play the sounds in.

    • Method Detail

      • loadSong

        public void loadSong(Song newSong)
        Loads a song into the player. The old song is discarded.
        Parameters:
        newSong - The song to load into the player

      • getActiveStep

        public int getActiveStep()
        Get the number of the current step.

      • setWaitTimeByBPM

        public void setWaitTimeByBPM(int bpm)
        Sets the bpm (Beats Per Minute) of the player. This calculates and sets the waitTime (time between two sounds play) of the timer.
        Parameters:
        bpm - the bpm to set

      • setBPMInRange

        public int setBPMInRange(int p)
        Sets the bpm in a given range (p). This method is called from progress bars in the GUI whos range is between 0 and 100. The bpm starts as 30 and each increase in the parameter increase the bpm by 3.
        Parameters:
        p - The bpm are calculated with 30 + 3 * p
        Returns:
        the bpm set to the player

      • play

        public void play()
        Starts the player and its timer.

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Stops the player. Also notifies all observers with (-1).

      • isPlaying

        public boolean isPlaying()
        Method for seeing if the player is running or not.
        Returns:
        true if the player is running, else false
